import React from "react"; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Dashboard() { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = location.state?.user || { name: "Investor", email: "user@example.com" }; const summary = { portfolioValue: 12450.0, availableBalance: 2300.0, pnl24h: 215.75, }; const market = [ { symbol: "BTC", name: "Bitcoin", price: 68500, change24h: 2.1 }, { symbol: "ETH", name: "Ethereum", price: 3200, change24h: -1.2 }, { symbol: "SOL", name: "Solana", price: 150, change24h: 4.3 }, { symbol: "ADA", name: "Cardano", price: 0.45, change24h: 0.8 }, ]; const transactions = [ { id: 1, type: "Deposit", amount: 500, date: "2025-11-11", status: "Completed" }, { id: 2, type: "Buy BTC", amount: 200, date: "2025-11-10", status: "Completed" }, { id: 3, type: "Sell ETH", amount: 150, date: "2025-11-09", status: "Completed" }, { id: 4, type: "Withdraw", amount: 100, date: "2025-11-08", status: "Pending" }, ]; const formatCurrency = (v) => new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "USD" }).format(v); const formatDate = (dateStr) => new Date(dateStr).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric", }); return (
{/* Header */}

CryptoInvest Dashboard

Welcome back, {user.name} ðŸ‘‹

{/* Account Summary */}

Portfolio Value

{formatCurrency(summary.portfolioValue)}

= 0 ? "text-green-600" : "text-red-600"}`}> {summary.pnl24h >= 0 ? "+" : "-"} {formatCurrency(Math.abs(summary.pnl24h))} in the last 24h

Available Balance

  • Last login: Today
